channel.title: HELP ME! "error connection to server"!
channel.description:
Please help me!!!!!! :( :( :( :( :(
Im using utorrent to put my server online but every time someone trys to log in it says
"error connection to server" please help me
PS. I am using utorroent because i cant portforward cuz i dont know my password because i live with my grand parents and there in Germany right now for another month and they have the password so tell me why its not wokring.
Thanks :D

item.title: HELP ME! "error connection to server"!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

make sure your servers ip (e.g. yourserv.no-ip.biz) is set in your client, and it directs the players to your server, if you can only connect, that means your client is set to 127.0.0.1, which is local host, meaning you can only connect from the computer your hosting your server from, go to gui.java, and change the ip there

Read full topic
